```
---
metadata:
  name: busybox
  namespace: crio
linux:
  security_context:
    namespace_options:
      network: 2
```

```
---
metadata:
  name: busybox
image:
  image: docker.io/library/busybox:latest
args:
  - "/bin/sleep"
  - "36000"
```
